generationConfig.promptTemplate: Generate a vocabulary entry for the {language} word "{word}". Provide a concise definition in English and translations for the following languages: en, de, es, fr, it, ja, pt. If a direct translation isn't common or appropriate, provide a short phrase or explanation in that language. Format the output as JSON matching the schema.

markingConfig.promptTemplate: N/A - Marking not applicable for this schema
